name: Rock Paper Scissor Battle
description:
Its a simple addictive brain game. You just have to follow simple Rock Paper Scissor Rule and as follow
- Rock Smashes Scissor
- Scissor Cuts Paper
- Paper Wraps Rock

There are two modes in this game. You can play with A.I (Artificial Intelligence) and you can also challenge you family and friends. You just have to be very clever all the time beat your opponent. So use your brain in this challenging epic battle and beat your family and friends.

Features:
- HD graphics.
- Epic Animations.
- Soothing Sounds and Music.
- Play with A.I if your friends and family members are not available.
- Challenge your friends and family.
- Player with max points will win the epic challenge.

Don't forget support us by giving your kind reviews!!!
